term.longtitle: IUPAC Gold Book - spectrochemical buffer in atomic spectroscopy
term.title: spectrochemical buffer

item.text: Buffer added to samples and reference samples with the intention of making the measure of the analytical element less sensitive to changes in concentration of an interferent.
